entry.source: I am Enlil, king of the gods of Babylon.{F801}{F804,5}Anzu{F804,0} has stolen the {F804,5}{F872,1}.{F804,0}{F801}He is wandering around a red metal tower,{F801}like the Tower of Babel. I want you to find{F801}Anzu, defeat him, and bring the {F872,1}{F801}to my messenger in a restaurant in Ginza.{F801}
